tool.name: AggregateData

param.name: Output_folder
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and folder where the output of this tool will be stored.

param.name: Data_to_aggregate
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and filename of the feature class with the data to aggregate.

param.name: Classification_column
param.dialogReference: Specify the column within the target feature class to be used as the basis for the aggregation analysis.

param.name: Aggregation_units
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and filename of the feature class containing the aggregation units.

param.name: Only_Consider_Agg_Units_Fully_Within_Study_Area
param.displayname: Only consider aggregation units which fully lie within the study area
param.dialogReference: If ticked, the tool will only calculate the aggregation metrics for units that lie fully within the study area.

tool.summary:
This tool takes the any vector data and reports aggregate metrics in:

  • Inverse Simpson diversity index

  • Shannon diversity index

  • Classifications per aggregation units

  • Mean patch size

The aggregation units can be a regular grid generated by the Create aggregation gridtool or a shapefile of other boundaries (e.g. watersheds, adminstrative districts, etc.)
